title: CV
text:
Senior Data Scientist — Analytics, Causal Inference & Experimentation
rosie@rosiedata.com · GitHub · LinkedIn


Product-focused data scientist with deep experience in analytics, causal impact, uplift modelling, and experimentation at scale. I build explainable tools that help PMs and coaches make confident decisions.



Technical: Python (pandas, NumPy, Altair), R (bsts), SQL (Snowflake), Streamlit, statsmodels, TensorFlow Probability
Methods: A/B/n, CUPED, diff-in-diff, BSTS, BH correction, sequential testing
